ARABIC: يَمْحُوا۟ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثْبِتُ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah erases whatever He wills or endorses it. The Master Copy of the Book is in His Hands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God abrogates or confirms whatsoever He will, for He has with Him the Book of Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah effaces whatever He wills and retains whatever He wills. With Him is the Mother of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: For every event God has ordained His decree. God establishes or effaces whatever He wants and with Him is the original of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah erases and confirms whatever He wills; and only with Him is the real script.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah blots out what He wills and confirms (what He wills). And with Him is the Mother of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah makes to pass away and establishes what He pleases, and with Him is the basis of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God blots out, and He establishes whatsoever He will; and with Him is the Essence of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah effaceth what He will, and establisheth (what He will), and with Him is the source of ordinance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God abrogates or confirms what He pleases; with Him is the source of all commandments.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah abolisheth whatsoever He Will and keepeth; and with Him is the mother of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah effaces and confirms whatever He wishes and with Him is the Mother Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah doth blot out or confirm what He pleaseth: with Him is the Mother of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah blots out what He wills and confirms (what He wills). And with Him is the Mother of the Book (Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah blots out, and He establishes what He will. With Him is the Essence of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God abolishes whatever He wills, and He affirms. With Him is the source of the Scripture.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah eliminates what He wills or confirms, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [13:39] God effaces, of it [the Book], whatever He will and He fixes (read yuthbit or yuthabbit), therein whatever He will of rulings or other matters, and with Him is the Mother of the Book, its [source of] origin, of which nothing is ever changed, and which consists of what He inscribed in pre-eternity (azal).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah effaceth what He will) from the scroll of the guardian angels which does not entail a reward or punishment, (and establisheth (what He will)) and leaves that which entails a reward or punishment, (and with Him is the source of ordinance) the source of the Book, i.e. the Preserved or Guarded Tablet, in which 263 nothing is added or taken away.
